text: You come across a homeless person begging for food. What do you do?
You see someone drop a health potion whilst in a rush. You pick it up and...
You see an injured Donomon under a tree.
You just won a Donomon match
You see a team of tamers attacking a child for their Donomon!
You go to a health center to heal your Donomon, but there's a barricade of Donomon at the entrance!
You go to battle with your Donomon, but when you summon it, it's limping!
You enter a cave and find a Donomon egg!
You find a group of baby Donomon playing in a field.
You realize that your friend has been stealing your Donomon's food!
You get a message from someone, letting you know that they need help with a Donomon.
You find a wishing stone hidden in a cave. It's very limited in what it can grant, what do you wish for?
You get surrounded by a group of bad guys, and they're trying to recruit you!
It's your first day of Donomon school! You see a group of kids bullying another kid.
You found out that time is stopping for everyone but you!
A baby Donomon started following you! You see that it is harmless
You are able to choose out of 3 Donomon eggs. Two people are also choosing!
You're asked to help in researching Donomon!
Your friend asks if your Donomon wants to play with their Donomon.
You see your Donomon rummaging through someone's garden!
Someone asks to buy your Donomon for a hefty price!
You see a mischievous Donomon trying to trip people!
You see a valuable stone in someones window. You know that they're not home and its easy to steal!
You go to a Donomon match, but you see that the Donomon are being treated poorly!
Deep in thought, you don't notice that you're about to walk into a wall! BAM!
